contract_description: The Supplier shall provide the following products/services to the Buyer: Product A, Product B, Product C
pricing_and_payment_terms: Product A: $10 per unit, Product B: $20 per unit, Product C: $30 per unit. Payment Terms: The Buyer shall make payments to the Supplier within 30 days from the receipt of a valid invoice. Payment Method: Payments shall be made via bank transfer, as agreed upon by both parties.
termination_clause: Termination for Convenience: Either party may terminate this Contract with 30 days written notice to the other party. Termination for Cause: Either party may terminate this Contract immediately in the event of a material breach by the other party.
